Name: Le Coeur
Review Text: Great wine, flavorful fresh food and service with attention to detail in a swanky setting right in the heart (ha) of the ever-gezellig Jordaan area. ‚Ä¶

Name: Le Coeur
Review Text: Cozy French restaurant in Jordaan. Perfect for sharing dishes (the burrata was really nice). Their wine menu is great with wide selection of French wines and champagnes.

Name: Le Coeur
Review Text: Very nice atmosphere, interesting menu and good flavours. However,  I find it crazy that every person has to pay 2,5 ‚Ç¨ for tap filtered water. Moreover from a bottle of wine that costs 16‚Ç¨, they offer you a glass for 10 ‚Ç¨, I find it very expensive! The service was veeeery slow!

Name: Le Coeur
Review Text: Loved everything! So happy about this new neighborhood gem. The food is amazing quality and definitely something unique. The wine card is excellent. Very polite and professional service, great atmosphere‚Ä¶ cannot wait to go back üòçü•∞‚ô•Ô∏è thank you for having us!

Name: Le Coeur
Review Text: Fantastic flavourful dishes in a warm and cosy atmosphere. Great selection of wines. High quality food at a reasonable price. Easy going restaurant. Strongly recommend.

Name: Le Coeur
Review Text: Very high standard of food and an amazing wine selection. Very friendly staff who really made sure we had a great night. THanks guys!

Review Text: (Translated by Google) It was a feast on the table, both for the eye and for the mouth. EVERYTHING was genuinely very tasty and seemed to be made with love. We had to order the pork belly twice. Service was also very friendly and helpful. ‚Ä¶
